Record.ClassificationPath: Respiratory Tract Diseases/Respiratory Hypersensitivity/Alveolitis, Extrinsic Allergic

Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Respiratory and Thoracic Disorder/Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Lung Disorder/Pneumonia/Alveolitis/Extrinsic Allergic Alveolitis
Respiratory Tract Diseases/Lung Diseases/Lung Diseases, Interstitial/Alveolitis, Extrinsic Allergic
Immune System Diseases/Hypersensitivity/Hypersensitivity, Immediate/Respiratory Hypersensitivity/Alveolitis, Extrinsic Allergic
Record.Description: A common interstitial lung disease caused by hypersensitivity reactions of PULMONARY ALVEOLI after inhalation of and sensitization to environmental antigens of microbial, animal, or chemical sources. The disease is characterized by lymphocytic alveolitis and granulomatous pneumonitis.
